DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card belonging to a #bArcanist, the #yMoxie of the #bArcanist increases by 1.
In each combat, whenever there are two adjacent unupgraded cards of #bArcanists with the same name in your hand, #rExhaust one and upgrade the other. NL #yMoxie of the #bArcanists increases by 1.
At most #r3 Ultimate can be played in each combat.
Immune to all damage until an attack card is played.
At the end of turn, take X damage.
Upon receiving attack damage, gains X #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as is triggered. Resets to X at the start of your turn.
